title: Ali
description: My name is Alison Smith, but you can call me Ali.I’m okay with my normal, boring life. I have good friends, and I know exactly what I want in life. But my whole world is turned upside down when my mom gets married and moves us to the Upper East Side. I just have to survive my senior year, then I can go back to Florida… back to my life.And that is the plan.Until I meet Christian Becker.He changes everything.
author: Mercy Amare
